pullrequest.title: Using `${prefix}/lib` in package.xml plugin_path is wrong.

content.raw:
An example of a project that uses the suggested `plugin_path=”${prefix}/lib”` is e.g. [https://github.com/pal-robotics/realsense\_gazebo\_plugin](https://github.com/pal-robotics/realsense_gazebo_plugin) . When you launch gazebo with this plugin on `ROS_PACKAGE_PATH`, the debug log of `gazebo_ros.paths_plugin` says:

`[DEBUG] [1575894134.676531222]: plugin path /opt/ros/cras_subt/src/realsense_gazebo_plugin/lib`

That’s apparently wrong, the lib directory cannot be under the sources dir. This will probably be a problem anywhere a devel space is used.
